title: Apply for Motorcycle Single Vehicle Approval (MSVA)

introductory_paragraph.content:
Apply for a [Motorcycle Single Vehicle Approval (MSVA)](/vehicle-approval/motorcycle-single-vehicle-approval) test for:

+ motorbikes
+ motorised tricycles
+ quadricycles, for example quad bikes

You can use this service to apply for a full or partial test.

*[MSVA]: Motorcycle Single Vehicle Approval
*[VIN]: Vehicle Identification Number

Apply for a Motorcycle Single Vehicle Approval (MSVA) test for:

  • motorbikes
  • motorised tricycles
  • quadricycles, for example quad bikes

You can use this service to apply for a full or partial test.

more_information.content:
To use the service you’ll need a:

+ completed [MSVA application form](/vehicle-approval/motorcycle-single-vehicle-approval)
+ Vehicle Identification Number (VIN) or chassis number

*[MSVA]: Motorcycle Single Vehicle Approval
*[VIN]: Vehicle Identification Number

To use the service you’ll need a:

  • completed MSVA application form
  • Vehicle Identification Number (VIN) or chassis number

description: Apply for a Motorcycle Single Vehicle Approval (MSVA) test for motorbikes, motorised tricycles or quadricycles, for example quad bikes.

meets_user_needs.title: As a person or business importing a vehicle into the UK, I need to know how to get my vehicle approved as safe and legal, so that I can use it on UK roads (103276)

details.benefit: I can use it on UK roads
details.goal: know how to get my vehicle approved as safe and legal

Knows which form they need to fill out
Has got approval for their vehicle
